unalcol.io

Class Read<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.io.Read<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of objects that will be read from the ShortTermMemoryReader.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadWrapper

    public abstract class Read<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Read

    Read service. Reads objects from a ShortTermMemoryReader.

    Source code is available.

        public Read()

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public abstract T read(ShortTermMemoryReader reader)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an object from the given reader
        Parameters:
        reader - The input stream from which the object will be read
        Returns:
        An object, of the type the read service is attending, that is read from the input stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • get

        public static Read<?> get(java.lang.Class<?> owner)
        Determines if the default service has been registered in the service infrastructure.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the service.
        Returns:
        The read method owned by owner.

      • set

        public static boolean set(java.lang.Class<?> owner,
                          Read<?> service)
        Sets the read service associated to the given class
        Parameters:
        owner - Class that owns the service
        service - Read service to be associated to the given class
        Returns:
        true If the read service can be associated to the given class, false otherwise.

      • apply

        public static java.lang.Object apply(java.lang.Class<?> obj,
                                     ShortTermMemoryReader reader)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an object from the given reader (The object should has a read method)
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to read
        reader - The reader object
        Returns:
        An object that is read from the reader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • readSeparator

        public static void readSeparator(ShortTermMemoryReader reader,
                                 char separator)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads space characters from a input reader up to finding the separator char.
        Parameters:
        reader - Input Reader
        separator - Character consider separator of tokens
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - An exception if it was not possible to read a separator sequence.
